channel.title: Posts on IWR 2023
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on IWR 2023

item.title: This is news
item.description: Welcome to the iwr website 2023. Sorry for the delay, but it’s here now. Here we will provide you with the latest information about the iwr in addition to the mail. This year the iwr will take place in the Baltic Sea. Therefore, this year it is allowed to install an electric bilge pump for safety reasons! In addition, buoyancy bodies have to be integrated into the boat or it has to be proven that the boat floats when it is full.
